response.explain: The task goal has been completed successfully. The bulb has been put in the bowl and the bowl has been put in the cabinet. The cabinet has been closed as well. There is no execution error. Therefore, no further steps are required.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the countertop.
(2) Grasp the daffodil bulb.
(3) Put the daffodil bulb in the mixing bowl.
(4) Grasp the mixing bowl.
(5) Move the robot to the top cabinet.
(6) Open the top cabinet.
(7) Put the mixing bowl in the top cabinet.
(8) Close the top cabinet.
response.code: # No code is needed as the task has been completed successfully.
